name: 胡同來
objective:
本課程包含：國際行銷環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
This course includes international marketing environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.
